title: Market And Tech Outlook For 2022
itunes:title: Market And Tech Outlook For 2022
description:
Phil Orlando, Chief Equity Strategist & Head of Client Portfolio Management at Federated Hermes, joins the show to discuss investing, inflation, and gives his market outlook for 2022. Priya Misra, Managing Director and Global Head of Rates Strategy at TD Securities, talks about markets and investing in 2022 amid the spread of Omicron. Greg Falesnik, CEO of MZ North America, discusses ESG investing and SPAC advisory. Dan Ives, Managing Director and Senior Equity Analyst at WedBush Securities, talks about Tesla and expectations for tech stocks in 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
